verses.verse: "At that time <S%H6256><s%> shall Michael <S%H4317><s%> stand up, <S%H5975><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> prince <S%H8269><s%> who stands <S%H5975><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people; <S%H5971><s%> and there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble, <S%H6869><s%> such as never was since there was a nation <S%H1471><s%> even to that same time: <S%H6256><s%> and at that time <S%H6256><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> shall be delivered, <S%H4422><s%> everyone who shall be found <S%H4672><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> in the book. <S%H5612><s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> of those who sleep <S%H3463><s%> in the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> shall awake, <S%H6974><s%> some to everlasting <S%H5769><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> and some to shame <S%H2781><s%> and everlasting <S%H5769><s%> contempt. <S%H1860><s%>

Those who are wise <S%H7919><s%> shall shine <S%H2094><s%> as the brightness <S%H2096><s%> of the expanse; <S%H7549><s%> and those who turn many <S%H7227><s%> to righteousness <S%H6663><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> forever <S%H5703><s%> and ever. <S%H5769><s%>

But you, <S%H1840><s%> Daniel, shut up <S%H5640><s%> the words, <S%H1697><s%> and seal <S%H2856><s%> the book, <S%H5612><s%> even to the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end: <S%H7093><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> shall run back and forth, <S%H7751><s%> and knowledge <S%H1847><s%> shall be increased. <S%H7235><s%>"

Then I, <S%H1840><s%> Daniel, looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H8147><s%> two others <S%H312><s%> stood, <S%H5975><s%> one <S%H259><s%> on the river <S%H2975><s%> bank <S%H8193><s%> on this side, <S%H2008><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on the river <S%H2975><s%> bank on that side. <S%H8193><s%>

One said <S%H559><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> who was above <S%H4605><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river, <S%H2975><s%> How long shall it be to the end <S%H7093><s%> of these wonders? <S%H6382><s%>

I heard <S%H8085><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> who was above <S%H4605><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river, <S%H2975><s%> when he held up <S%H7311><s%> his right hand <S%H3225><s%> and his left hand <S%H8040><s%> to heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> by him who lives <S%H2416><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> that it shall be for a time, <S%H4150><s%> times, <S%H4150><s%> and a half; <S%H2677><s%> and when they have made <S%H3615><s%> an end of breaking in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the power <S%H3027><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> all these things shall be finished. <S%H3615><s%>
I heard, <S%H8085><s%> but I didn't <S%H995><s%> understand: then I said, <S%H559><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> what shall be the issue of these things? <S%H319><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> Go your way, <S%H3212><s%> Daniel; <S%H1840><s%> for the words <S%H1697><s%> are shut up <S%H5640><s%> and sealed <S%H2856><s%> until the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end. <S%H7093><s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> shall purify <S%H1305><s%> themselves, <S%H3835><s%> and make themselves white, and be refined; <S%H6884><s%> but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall do wickedly; <S%H7561><s%> and none of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall understand; <S%H995><s%> but those who are wise <S%H7919><s%> shall understand. <S%H995><s%>

From the time <S%H6256><s%> that the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering shall be taken away, <S%H5493><s%> and the abomination <S%H8251><s%> that makes desolate <S%H8074><s%> set up, <S%H5414><s%> there shall be one thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he who waits, <S%H2442><s%> and comes <S%H5060><s%> to the one thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> - five <S%H2568><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

But go you your way <S%H3212><s%> until the end; <S%H7093><s%> for you shall rest, <S%H5117><s%> and shall stand <S%H5975><s%> in your lot, <S%H1486><s%> at the end <S%H7093><s%> of the days. <S%H3117><s%>
